verbose_text: As shown in XREF_FIG, ifenprodil 5 muM had no effect on the induction of LTD, suggesting that extrasynaptic GluN2B seems to antagonize LTP rather than simply mask LTP via LTD induction (fEPSPs were 53.1% and 46.7% of baseline values at 60 min after LTD induction in the absence or presence of the ifenprodil 5 muM, respectively; P = 0.73).
